Name: Ver
About the game: Ver is a single player horror adventure game where your goal is to collect five crystals in order to seal a portal to another dimension which was once opened and has brought dangers to our world. Traverse through a forest, church and a maze of tunnels in order to complete your objective while encountering dangerous mutants that will try to kill you. Loot items to aid you in your journey such as energydrinks, refills your stamina which could be the decision if you survive a chase or not. Medical supplies to get your health back up to ensure you can take that extra hit that otherwise could have killed you. Roaming mutants that will chase you down when you are detected can be found at several areas throughout the map with different variations being a bigger threat than others. Be on the lookout for safe areas that provide safety from the mutants. Checkpoints are present at certain locations so should you die all progress isn't lost.
